successStoriesTitle:
HEAR ABOUT OUR SUCCESS
FROM OUR MEMBERS
successStoriesSubtitle: Explore authentic stories from our graduates who have achieved incredible results. These are real voices, real growth, and real success.

reviews.name: John Carter
reviews.review: Nathan's program completely changed my career path. I went from struggling freelancer to closing $40k deals. Highly recommended!

reviews.name: Sophia Lee
reviews.review: Within a month, I transformed my agency results. The guidance was clear, practical, and absolutely life-changing.

reviews.name: Michael Smith
reviews.review: I've taken many online programs, but this is by far the best. Authentic, powerful, and worth every penny.

reviews.name: Emma Davis
reviews.review: I crossed $100,000 in sales thanks to this program. The strategies just work — no gimmicks, only results!

earlyLifeDescription1: Nathan Bentley is a seasoned entrepreneur and digital marketing expert, best known for founding Practice PhD and Steal My Agency. With a proven track record in building successful businesses, Nathan's journey to creating a $150k/month agency is nothing short of inspiring.
earlyLifeDescription2: His expertise and innovative strategies have positioned him as a leading figure in the digital marketing space, making his teachings highly sought after by agency owners and marketing professionals alike.
grandmasSubtitle: Unlike gurus we actively run a $150k/mrr agency right now!

faq.title:
FREQUENTLY
ASKED QUESTIONS
faq.answer1: Steal my agency is a comprehensive business program that teaches you how to build and scale your own marketing agency from scratch.
faq.question2: How long will I have access to Steal my agency?
faq.answer2: You will have lifetime access to all the course materials, updates, and community support once you enroll.
faq.question3: What makes SMA different from other groups?
faq.answer3: SMA focuses on practical, real-world implementation with proven systems, mentorship, and a supportive community of successful agency owners.
faq.question4: Can I pay the enrollment fee in installments?
faq.answer4: Yes, we offer flexible payment plans to make the program accessible. Contact our support team for available installment options.
faq.question5: Is the content live or recorded?
faq.answer5: The program includes both live sessions for real-time interaction and recorded content that you can access anytime at your own pace.
faq.answer6: This program is designed to work for anyone committed to building a successful agency, regardless of your current experience level or background.
